title: Jessy Pouliot
subtitle: Senior Software Engineer
presentation: Experienced full-stack developer with 5 years of experience in the industry developing and maintaining web & mobile applications with a strong focus on Typescript based technologies such as Next.js and React-Native. Proven track record in building high-performance APIs, amazing developer tools and impressive user experiences. Being very proficient with my technology stack, I can deliver features in a timely manner while exceeding quality expectations.

list.text: We reduced our time to update copy from 2 weeks to a couple seconds by implementing a CMS combined with a JSON cache on a CDN for the fastest response time.

content.text: Front end web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React
Back end web development with Php, Laravel and MySQL
Game development with Unity3D and C#
Graphic design and UI/UX design rules

list.details: I can easily come up with clever solutions to complex problems and I can easily freestyle quality user interfaces.
I want to understand everything and learn every quirks of the tools I use in order to make the best decisions every time.

content.text: Building complex user interfaces such as:

list.text: User customizable layouts built with React and CSS "gridTemplateAreas" for displaying multiple media sources via a drag & drop editor for a seamless user experience.
Infinitely scrollable timeline component built in React and VanillaJS, leveraging clever solutions to build a high-performance result by rendering only what is visible on.

content.text: Building high performance APIs using postgreSQL, Redis, Trpc and react-query.
Built a mobile application from A to Z using React-Native with (almost) feature parity with the website

Implemented monorepo tools allowing for easy sharing of code between both our apps, caching task results and refining our CI/CD pipeline, improving our pipeline time to finish, reducing machine cost and developer inefficiency.
Closely collaborated with the designers and project manager to improve making sure we deliver the best features we can.
Built the building blocks of the mobile app, improving developer productivity and quality across multiple teams.
Key resource in fixing bugs for the mobile app, I always volunteered to help as I was very good at finding the root of theses issues.
Add and maintain APIs built in Laravel, MySQL and ElasticSearch
Built a video feature for our email editor in both our website and mobile app to increase communication and sales during COVID travel restrictions.
I joined the react-native team to learn the technology and swifly grew to become the mobile team lead.
